topics.body:
Daredevil spoilers ahead.

[spoiler]Y'know what's more satisfying than watching a villain get punched? Watching a villain's enterprise, his empire that he's worked on for so long, crumble right in front of him. All the money, all the influence, all the power snatched away. And he can't do anything to stop it. Watching a man who considers himself an untouchable criminal GOD realizing exactly what he is. A mere man.[/spoiler]
